entry.title: Restarting node.js server automatically when source code changes
entry.content:
During development, you're constantly changing your source files. Normally that would require you to call something like

$ node server.js everytime you change your on of your source files.

A simple workaround is to $ sudo npm install supervisor -g Now you run $ supervisor server.js Only once and everytime your source code changes, your development server gets restarted by supervisor automatically.
